</head> <body> <div id="menu" py:if="desc.classes"> <ul> <li class="header" py:content="desc.pathname" /> <li py:for="class_ in desc.classes"><a href="${class_.details}" style="text-transform: none" py:content="class_.name" /></li> </ul> </div> <div id="content" class="api"> <h1 py:content="desc.pathname" /> <p class="docstring" py:content="project.render_description(desc)" /> <h2 py:if="desc.modules">Sub-Modules</h2> <py:for each="module in desc.modules" py:if="module.pathname not in project.options.exclude_modules" py:replace="describe(module)" /> <h2 py:if="desc.classes">Classes</h2> <py:for each="class_ in desc.classes" py:replace="describe(class_)" /> <h2 py:if="desc.functions">Functions</h2> <py:for each="function in desc.functions" py:replace="describe(function)" /> </div> </body> </html>
